name: OVERLOAD (itch) (SkyBrave)
description:
This prototype made for the BUG Spring Jam 2022. My focus with this project was to experiment with the character controls and core gameplay feature (which is exploding sphere enemies, lol). I wanted to test out my knowledge in game feel and try to apply it in just 24 hours. I experimented with different character control systems and tried to polish the game feel as much as possible. 

So, there is no gameplay loop or win/lose states implemented in the game. Just open it, control your crazy rocket, explode some HUGE *but deadly* spheres and RELAX!

HOW TO PLAY

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move
